name: Decom
description:
Choose your loadout to fight through increasingly more difficult waves of bots! You can only bring one primary and secondary gun to each area, so choose carefully. Surviving through each unlocked area consecutively unlocks the next milestone. Good luck!

  • A drag and drop loadout interface
  • 7 different guns to equip (4 unlocked at the start)
  • 3 unique levels (1 unlocked at the start)
  • 7 unlockable achievements
  • Autosaving after each milestone

I solo developed this game as my senior thesis project. Built on Unreal Engine 5's Blueprint visual scripting language, the project took 4 months to complete and features all of my own pixel art, including animated sprites, tile sets, GUI, and a pixel font.

All sounds and music from zapsplat.com. Game graphics made using GNU Image Manipulation Program. In-game font created using BitFontMaker2.
